name: Booyah Belt Mega Women
description:
The Booyah Belt takes wearing pants to a whole new level. This patent-pending belt makes it super easy to remove the pure stainless steel buckle without removing the entire belt.

Make a bold statement with the Mega Booyah Belt - our 1.5” belt design. Buckle up!

• Interchangeable straps 
• Infinite Adjustment 
• Washable straps
• Vegan (gluten free too!)
• Made in SF Bay Area

<i>Dimensions:<i> 
<i>2.75"x2"x1/8" stainless steel<i>
<i>1.5" synthetic cotton strap<i>

name: Booyah Belt Medio Women
description:
The Booyah Belt takes wearing pants to a whole new level. This patent-pending belt makes it super easy to remove the pure stainless steel buckle without removing the entire belt.

Juggle your active life in style with the Medio Booyah Belt - our 1.25” belt design. Who said casual needs to be boring?

• Interchangeable straps 
• Infinite Adjustment 
• Washable straps
• Vegan (gluten free too!)
• Made in SF Bay Area

<i>Dimensions:<i> 
<i>2.25"x1.75"x1/8" stainless steel<i>
<i>1.25" synthetic cotton strap<i>

description:
The Booyah Belt takes wearing pants to a whole new level. This patent-pending belt makes it super easy to remove the pure stainless steel buckle without removing the entire belt.

Spice things up with the Nano Booyah Belt - our 1” belt design. Because sometimes less is definitely more.

• Washable straps
• Vegan (gluten free too!)
• Made in SF Bay Area

<i>Dimensions:<i> 
<i>2"x1.5"x1/8" stainless steel<i>
<i>1" synthetic cotton strap<i>

name: Additional Straps Women
description: Customize your Mega buckle (1.5'' strap) with a variety of additional strap colors . Straps are washable. Customize your Medio buckle (1.25'' strap) with a variety of additional strap colors . Straps are washable. Customize your Nano buckle (1'' strap) with a variety of additional strap colors . Straps are washable.
